name: Cannon Thunder
description:
Hello my dear pirate friend!

You're stuck on the sea, surrounded by enemy ships. Choose a Ship and try to survive as long as you can.

This game is made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 258

Controls

Up - Accelerate
Down - Brake
Left and Right - Steer
Space - Shoot
Tab - Switch Canon direction
Your ship can only shoot in one direction!

Credits:

Assets used from Kenney.nl:
- Pirate Pack

Sounds used from OpenGameArt:
- Cannon fire - Thimras
- Cannon hit - Thimras
- 5 Pillager Sounds - StarNinjas
- Water Splash (Yo Frankie!) - Blender Foundation
- Gull Sounds - AntumDeluge
- Beach Ocean Waves - jasinski
- Arr! - bart
- Click - qubodup
- Loop Pirates Ahoy - AntumDeluge
